title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Prime Cuts: Rodgers Media Battles, Packers Playoffs with Tyler Dunne and Mike Silver on Flores Firing, Harbaugh NFL Return (?)
itunes:title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Prime Cuts: Rodgers Media Battles, Packers Playoffs with Tyler Dunne and Mike Silver on Flores Firing, Harbaugh NFL Return (?)
description:
It's the best of The Colin Cowherd Podcast! First, it's top takes of the week (3:00), including his theory about Aaron Rodgers and Boomer Esiason's public beef, the origins of the mysterious text that started it, and reacts to the Giants firing Joe Judge after 2 seasons and why he didn't work out in NYC. Then, Tyler Dunne - founder of the Go Long Newsletter - discusses Aaron Rodgers' beef over MVP voting (12:00), and if he needs another Super Bowl to cement his legacy (14:00), if he stays in Green Bay beyond this season (17:00), and which playoff opponent could give them major problems (22:00). Next, Longtime NFL writer Mike Silver gives his insight into what really happened with the Brian Flores/Dolphins breakup (29:00) and if Jim Harbaugh would really leave Michigan to return to the NFL (34:00). Finally, The Action Network's Chad Millman tells Colin if he's a sharp or square with his Eagles/Buccaneers, Niners/Cowboys and Steelers/Chiefs Wild Card Picks (38:00).

Make sure to Subscribe and follow Colin and The Volume on Twitter for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
